Now, even on CUDA, you'll get:

body_text:
This has been fixed upstream.
Now, even on CUDA, you'll get:
RuntimeError: mismatch between the batch size of input (5) and that of target (4) at /home/fatbox/code/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/ClassNLLCriterion.cu:3
body:
This has been fixed upstream.
Now, even on CUDA, you'll get: 
```
RuntimeError: mismatch between the batch size of input (5) and that of target (4) at /home/fatbox/code/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/ClassNLLCriterion.cu:3
```
